column4: I'm sorry IndyGunFreak i have problems with hp pavillon dv 6000 and driver nvidia
64 and i used NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-173.14.12-pkg2 and NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-173.14.05-pkg2 with no good result
Wouldn't it be easier if you install the driver with restricted driver manager instead of doing it manually ?
